alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 2:39PM PDT until March 13 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Shasta Valley in Central Siskiyou County, including portions of the I-5 between Weed and Grenada and US Route 97 near Weed. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
